name: Squidnoid Attack
description:
Controls: A for Left, D for Right, Space to shoot.

This game was built for Ben Tristem's Unity course on Unity. All assets were created by me, including music and sprites. Most code use in the game was taught in the Udemy course, though I included custom code of my own as well (such as the alternating fire of the lasers).

Tools used to create art and music are piskelapp.com and beepbox.co. Another music tool used to spice up the title track (originally created in beepbox), was Sunvox. All tools I used are free, and awesome.
